concept.title: Application Modules
concept.shortdesc: application modules provide the foundation of repeatable common business processes, regardless of program. application modules meet the requirements of a single program or multiple programs in a configurable and reusable package.

conbody.p: The following application modules provide extra capabilities to handle the complex processes that are associated with specific programs. These application modules reduce the time and risk that is associated with developing the complex processes of those programs, and provide simplified maintenance update capabilities:

The application module provides extra capabilities to handle the complex processes that are associated with specific programs. It reduces the time and risk that is associated with developing the complex processes of the programs, and provide simplified maintenance update capabilities.

section.title: Income Support
section.p: provides complete eligibility determination and benefit calculation for social programs that provide food, cash and medical assistance to families in need. is a commercial integrated service delivery solution that equips organizations with a powerful, proven set of business tools and processes designed specifically for the effective management of income support programs.

section.title: Income Support for Medical Assistance
section.p: enables social program organizations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of managing eligibility and entitlement services for medical assistance. equips organizations with a powerful set of business tools and processes designed specifically for the effective management of traditional medical assistance, Affordable Care Act (ACA), and Modified Adjusted Gross Income (MAGI)-based Medicaid and Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) programs.
